data.text: @Venj_SG Hi, Venj. Our tickets are non-transferable. However, we can accept name correction requests. Thank you.
@humam051 We have sent you a DM. Thank you.
@humam051 Hi, هُمام. We will request additional booking information from you. Kindly adjust your settings on Twitter so we can send you a direct message. Thank you!

data.text: @GopalPa73189857 Hi, Gopal. We are dependent on the update from the office concerned. We have sent another follow up to them about this.
@jnneramos Hello, Joanne. We suggest that the passenger bring a photocopy of the card and a valid ID of the cardholder.
@eaterthinker Hi, Adelyn. We have sent you a direct message for further assistance on this.
@geo_travelerph Hi, GM. We sent you a direct message.
@jayrmorales1 Hi, Jay. As long as the vouchers are named after the one who is redeeming them, yes.

@kathrosario28 We're sorry for the inconvenience caused by the schedule changes, Kathryn. Please know that flights are highly subject to change. We will not disrupt a flight if it is not deemed necessary.
@emrotaeche We're sorry for the delay. We have sent you a message, Emil.
@ChristainDeal Hello, Dale. Travel guide varies per destination. You may check the travel rules and requirements here: https://t.co/wg2Bxn3jFQ

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

data.text: @emrotaeche We're sorry to learn about this, Emil. Kindly follow us so we could send you a DM to assist you further. Thank you.

@qclar18 We regret to learn this, Clarisse. We sent you a message. Kindly check your inbox.

@ncthoew We'll have it checked, Sakurangot.
@ShoutOutZombie Kindly check our DM, Shout Out Zombie.
@joefranc Thank you for your kind words, JF! We are glad to have you on board! ✈

@manaois_jason We were informed by the concerned office that the said delay was due to operational requirements. Again, we're truly sorry for the inconvenience. 

(2/2)

(1/2)

data.text: @TaotaoTasi Our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience, Chamorro. We'll send you a dm.

@ninaxviii However, please note that entry restrictions and requirements are constantly evolving. Thus, we highly suggest to check this with the concerned travel authority in your origin and destination as well. 

(2/2)

@Respected61 Hi, AMT. We're sorry to hear this. As much as we'd like to assist you here, we regret to inform you that we have limited access to third party bookings. 

It will be best to directly coordinate with your issuing agent directly for further assistance on this.
@katedado We've responded, K.
@TaotaoTasi Hi, Chamorro. We're truly sorry to hear this. May we know if you were able to file a report upon arrival?

@clydebarretto We're truly sorry to hear this, Clyde. We assure you that we wouldn't disrupt a flight unless it was deemed necessary. :( We've tried sending you a dm to ask for the passenger's details but we are unable to do so. Kindly check your settings.
@xomikhael We've sent you a dm, Ley. Kindly check.
@ShoutOutZombie This is noted. We've tried sending you a dm but we are unable to do so. Kindly check your settings.
@ShoutOutZombie We're truly sorry to hear this. May we know if you are using a US/Canada-issued card?
@ShoutOutZombie Hi, Shout Out Zombie. May we know if you were charged for the transaction? If not, we suggest to try to clear your browser's cache, refresh, and try to book again.

@QCMD918 However, please note that entry restrictions and requirements are constantly evolving. Thus, we highly suggest to check this with the concerned travel authority in your origin and destination as well. 

(2/2)
@manaois_jason Hi, Jhay. We're sorry to hear this. May we know if this is for today? May we know if you are at the airport?

@fabiodelibra Hi Fabio. We wish to send you a message but unable to due to your profile settings. May we ask you to change your settings so we may initiate a conversation and assist you with your concern. Thank you!
@MochiWren Hi, MochiWren. We only operate flights to and from San Francisco. We suggest coordinating with the third-party booking site where you are availing this for assistance. Thank you.
@willbub Hi, Will. We're sorry. We have sent you a DM to further check on this.

@thriftykfan Hello, Dan. We suggest coordinating with our Cargo team regarding your concern about rates. They can best assist you on this. 

https://t.co/8ibgaeOTSR

@janna_domingo Hello, Janna. Upon confirmation, there was a medical emergency in the earlier flight that caused the delay of your flight which utilizes the same aircraft. We are sorry for the inconvenience this has caused.
